extraSections.text:
# Hamster Village: Population 1,111

Hamster Village is a collection of 1111 unique Hamsters who live in a small village. The village itself is located on NEAR Blockchain. Our main goal is to build the friendliest and largest NEAR village in the metaverse and create  the best, interesting and addictive play-to-earn game out there. Welcome to Hamster Village!

# Roadmap

### ✅ Phase Generation 
 * Launch Twitter & Discord
 * Launch Website
 * Member Whitelist

 ### ✅ Phase Evolution 
 * Marketing & Collaborations
 * Mint & Listing
 * DAO Launch

 ### ✅ Phase Prime 
 * Buy-Back of NFTs for Royalty
 * NFT Airdrop for Holders
 * Branded Clothing and Merch

 ### ✅ Phase Domination
 * Develop Play-to-Earn Metaverse Farm Game
 * Develop Custom Tokens for Game
 * Launch Token
